channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The GOP megabill is moving to the Senate, where big changes could be in store

item.title: A Giant Plume of Saharan Dust Is Headed to Florida
item.description: Dust carried across the Atlantic is one of the great wonders of the weather world. This is the most significant cloud so far this year.

item.title: What to Know About the Russia-Ukraine Cease-Fire Talks
item.description: The two sides are meeting on Monday in Istanbul, but expectations for a breakthrough are low.

item.title: U.K. to Build Up to 12 Submarines as Part of Shift to ‘War-Fighting Readiness’

item.title: Bangladesh’s Ousted Leader Sheikh Hasina Faces New Arrest Warrant

item.title: The Imports the U.S. Relies On Most From 140 Nations, From Albania to Zimbabwe
item.description: A look at the item from each country that makes up the largest American import share.
